entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1 with patchy frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 with patchy frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
